summary:
Goal:
Develop Products and Deliver Solutions targeting Emerging Markets, while being relevant to Global Needs.

Expertise in leveraging technology to create medical devices and applications to effectively solve problems of access, cost and quality of healthcare.

Past Experience:
* Technology and operations management at product development startups.
* Ramp-up and scale-down teams for outsourced software services.
* Building high-performance teams through inclusive leadership. Ability to spot and groom hi-pot talent to take up increasingly challenging responsibilities and deliver.
* Developing software for medical devices & applications.
* Strong execution skills. (Able to focus on the trees while not losing sight of the forest).

Specialties:
* Interventional Oncology Applications.
* Diagnostic Imaging Modalities and Applications.
* X-Ray Image Acquisition, Control and Reconstruction.
* Software Platform Development (Frameworks and Services for: Communication, Event Management, Image Processing, Service Tools and Components; COTS Integration) for Imaging Modalities.
* Medical Imaging Standards, and Interoperability.

Top 3 High-Impact Projects I've loved working on:
1. Full Product Lifecycle for Development of Perfint's Robotic Solutions for Image-Guided Interventional Procedures (Role: Product Manager & Architect)
2. GE's X-Ray Image Detection & Controller Development for the first ever flagship mobile X-Ray Detector (Role: Software Designer & Developer)
3. Development of full featured, high performance, and reliable multi-platform DICOM Communication Server deployed across GE Healthcare products (Role: Software Developer & Team Leader)
and my first ever project: IOP (Imaging Open Platform)

message.text:
Indeed, the links in the below article would save hundreds of hours of time for a lot of people!

I recently used the below prompt to test out PPT creation using OpenAI's GPT-4o model:
I'd like you to build VBA code for a PowerPoint presentation on a strategy for building a digital pathology product and establishing a business case around this product. Scour the web for such products and include the best-in-class features, and build a solution including these. Please come up with milestone based delivery and schedule including resources and skills required. Come up with a strategy on how to acquire the first 100 customers for this product, and what solutions can be built around this product. Include all the possible sales strategies and sales channels to create and scale the business. There are no placeholders; you must fill in all of the text using your own understanding. There is no limit on the number of slides that you can create. 

This sets up a basic (rudimentary) 10-slide presentation which you can continue to refine by updating the prompt / refinement-prompts!
Without AI, coming up with something similar would take atleast a few hours...

Say Goodbye to Powerpoint.
Stop wasting time on design work and tutorials. 
Let AI do all the work 🦾
 
Top 8 websites to create presentations with AI in seconds:


✅ Beautiful AI

Great AI-powered presentation software for teams that helps to create presentations, collaborate, and present from anywhere.

👉 beautiful.ai


✅ SlidesAI

An AI-powered tool that transforms any text into visually appealing slides, saving you hours of time and effort.

👉 slidesai.io


✅ Gamma

Transform your presentation standards with Gamma App, a tool that outpaces traditional software like PowerPoint and Google Slides.

👉 https://gamma.app/


✅ Decktopus AI

A platform that creates 100% custom-tailored presentations on the texts you enter.

👉 https://www.decktopus.com/


✅ Slidebean

It helps startups present to investors. Design powerful, professional presentations in minutes (not hours) with this AI-powered platform.

👉 https://slidebean.com/


✅ Sendsteps AI

AI presentation maker designed to assist students in creating interactive and engaging presentations for academic purposes. You can create presentations 10x faster with this tool

👉 https://www.sendsteps.com/


✅ Presentations AI

Instantly transform ideas into professional presentations with an AI-driven design assistant.

👉 presentations.ai


✅ Tome

AI app that automates presentation creation using a variety of AI-powered tools.

👉 https://tome.app/


Follow Gina Acosta Gutiérrez 👩🏻‍💻 for more resources!

➡ Get the latest AI insights, tools, tutorials and guides on using popular AI tools for FREE here: https://lnkd.in/ewfrvcy5

#data #ai #artificialintelligence #innovation #learning #productivity #technology #tech

We are HIRING! 

Embark on a transformative journey with Erba Transasia!

Step into a collaborative, forward-thinking, and inclusive environment where your contributions can catalyze tangible advancements in the healthcare sector. With over 40 opportunities available across entry-level to leadership positions in Technical Service, Finance, Accounts, IT, and more, spanning various cities in India, there's a role tailored to your expertise and aspirations.

Join our esteemed team committed to offering affordable and accessible diagnostics across every nook and corner of the globe, thereby fostering a healthier and happier world. Together, let's sculpt the future landscape of clinical diagnostics while elevating patient care standards to unprecedented heights.

Share your resume to career@transasia.co.in to begin this transformative journey!

#TransasiaCareers #HealthcareInnovation #JoinOurTeam

Exciting announcements mark the beginning of the New Financial Year! 
Erba Transasia is pleased to introduce our newest innovation: the Erba Chem 6
Following the success of the highly acclaimed Erba Chem 5X, we take great pride in introducing the Erba Chem 6. This state-of-the-art Clinical Chemistry analyzer features an inbuilt incubator, ensuring improved convenience and user-friendly software for impeccable accuracy and precision. 
Tailored to meet the needs of startup laboratories, it effortlessly handles routine and specialized chemistries. #IAmTransasia #WeAreErba #Biochemistry #IVD #pathology #labmedicine #ClinicalChemistry

Sickle cell anemia is one of a group of inherited disorders known as sickle cell disease. It affects the shape of red blood cells, which carry oxygen to all parts of the body.
Red blood cells are usually round and flexible, so they move easily through blood vessels. In sickle cell anemia, some red blood cells are shaped like sickles or crescent moons. These sickle cells also become rigid and sticky, which can slow or block blood flow.
Management of sickle cell anemia is usually aimed at avoiding pain episodes, relieving symptoms and preventing complications. Treatments might include medicines and blood transfusions. For some children and teenagers, a stem cell transplant might cure the disease. Gene therapies also are being developed that may offer cures for people with sickle cell disease.
The Erba Sickle Cell Rapid Test Kits designed & developed in India, for India & the World and compliant with the ICMR guidelines, will be crucial in National Sickle Cell Anemia Eradication Mission 2047..
#IAmTransasia #WeAreErba #MakeInIndia #sicklecell #sicklecellanemia #IVD #pathology #labmedicine #NSCEM

Exciting Announcement! 
Erba Transasia is thrilled to introduce the ErbaQik Sickle Cell Rapid test kits, proudly crafted in India, as a powerful ally in realizing Hon. Prime Minister Narendra Modi's vision for the National Sickle Cell Anemia Eradication Mission 2047!
These cutting-edge kits, meticulously designed and developed in India, mark a significant stride towards our national goal. With a remarkable 100% sensitivity and specificity, validated by ICMR, they promise a dependable solution for detecting HbA, HbS, and/or HbC, crucial markers for Sickle Cell Anemia or Sickle Cell Trait.
Empowering mass screening initiatives and bolstering diagnostic networks, these kits are set to revolutionize healthcare interventions across higher care facilities. Get ready to witness a paradigm shift in disease detection and intervention!
Watch this space for more updates.. 
#IAmTransasia #WeAreErba #MakeInIndia #sicklecell #sicklecellanemia #IVD #pathology #labmedicine #NSCEM

message.text:
Radiology Operations Command Center (#ROCC) is a brilliant solution making healthcare more accessible and affordable.. - https://lnkd.in/gBMZRsCq

It was more than 8 years ago (2015-16) that I built the first ever prototype of this solution using the then #SkypeForBusiness and demonstrated its capabilities on the MRI Console. It was then called the #UnifiedCommunications Solution. This is when the seeds of this idea germinated!

Things sometimes (!) move slowly in the medical imaging world, but happy to see the product see the light of day, and this simple idea bloom into a full-blown solution making a real impact. Kudos to the people & teams who've worked on it!
Hagar Anna Spits, Lisa opt Hof, Simon Krijnen, Praveen Kumar Baskaran, Yogesh Lowalekar, Pramod Chandrashekhar, Vinay Parthan, Sandeep Kumar Bingi, Ranbir Sinha, Kewal Krishna, Rohit Shirodkar, Lakshmi Sivaram
